turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order for a drink at Starbucks for me to pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which Starbucks would you like to pick up your beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on 18th & Market in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cafe mocha, a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: authentic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. would you like whipped cream on your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay. let me make sure i got that right: a venti mocha with 2% milk, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your coffee will be ready to be picked up at the Starbucks store at 18th and market in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you will receive your receipt shortly via text. enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I will. Have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you too, byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
